name: Braised Bavarian Red Cabbage
description: With its vibrant jewel tones, braised red cabbage glows with good health. An excellent side for braised meats.

ingredients.name: red cabbage
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cut in half, then thinly sliced

preparation: Heat oil in a Multipurpose Pot over medium-high heat. Add onions and cabbage. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring continuously.
Add apple, sugar, raspberry vinegar, water, juniper berries and bay leaf.
Reduce heat to low, cover with a tight fitting lid and simmer for 25 minutes. Remove juniper berries and bay leaf before serving.
tips: Bump up the flavour by adding 1 or 2 cinnamon sticks while braising.
